control.description: composite control consisting of a list control and a thumbnail panel

subitems.subitem:
<controls> <control> <description>background</description> <type>image</type> <posX>0</posX> <posY>0</posY> <width>184</width> <height>260</height> <texture flipY="yes" diffuse="Thumb_Mask.png" mask="DVDCase_coverflow_mask.png">black.png</texture> </control>
<control> <description>Watched Icon</description> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>158</posX> <posY>10</posY> <width>15</width> <height>15</height> <texture>overlaywatched.png</texture> <colordiffuse>#ColorPlayed</colordiffuse> <visible>string.contains(#myfilms.user.watched.value)</visible> </control> <control> <description>Un-Watched Icon</description> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>158</posX> <posY>10</posY> <width>15</width> <height>15</height> <texture>overlayunwatched.png</texture> <visible>!string.contains(#myfilms.user.watched.value)</visible> </control>
<control> <description>Movie Title</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <id>0</id> <posX>15</posX> <posY>6</posY> <width>150</width> <label>#myfilms.user.mastertitle.value</label> <font>font13</font> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> <shadowAngle>45</shadowAngle> <shadowDistance>2</shadowDistance> <shadowColor>FF000000</shadowColor> </control>
<control> <type>image</type> <id>0</id> <posX>15</posX> <posY>-20</posY> <width>154</width> <height>53</height> <texture>bg_button_nofocus.png</texture> </control>
<control> <type>imagelist</type> <id>1</id> <posX>15</posX> <posY>41</posY> <width>185</width> <height>40</height> <textureWidth>15</textureWidth> <textureHeight>15</textureHeight> <subitems> <subitem>star_nofocus.png</subitem> <subitem>star_focus.png</subitem> </subitems> <orientation>horizontal</orientation> <align>left</align> <imagesToDraw>10</imagesToDraw> <percentage>#myfilms.db.rating.value</percentage> </control> <control> <description>genre</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>15</posX> <posY>62</posY> <width>165</width> <label>#myfilms.db.category.value</label> <font>font11</font> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> </control> <control> <description>year</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>15</posX> <posY>87</posY> <width>160</width> <label>#myfilms.db.year.value #myfilms.db.length.value #myfilms.db.length.unit</label> <font>font11</font> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> </control>
<control> <description>Director</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>15</posX> <posY>113</posY> <width>160</width> <label>Dir. by #myfilms.db.director.value</label> <font>font11</font> <wrapString> : : : </wrapString> </control> <control> <description>cast</description> <type>fadelabel</type> <posX>15</posX> <posY>140</posY> <width>160</width> <label>#myfilms.db.actors.value</label> <font>font10</font> <lineSpacing>2</lineSpacing> <align>left</align> <textcolor>90FFFFFF</textcolor> </control>
<control> <description>plot</description> <type>textboxscrollup</type> <posX>15</posX> <posY>165</posY> <width>160</width> <height>40</height> <label>#myfilms.db.description.value</label> <font>font9</font> <lineSpacing>2</lineSpacing> </control>
</controls>
